betawarning: This service operates in your browser. If you have any problems, please go back and choose a different format. In particular, on mobile devices, this is likely to be unusable for very long recordings or recordings with many participants.
wizarddesc: This tool will download, process, and export your audio. Click 'Auto' to do all of that in automatic mode, 'Edit' if you'd like to perform other editing, or 'Cancel' otherwise.
postedit: After downloading and performing any editing you wish, you may click 'Wizard' to continue automatic processing.
projectsexist: Previous projects are currently saved in your browser. They will be deleted to save space.
projectexists: The requested ID already exists. You may have already downloaded it. If your original download was interrupted, you need to restart downloading. If your original download finished, you can load the previous downloaded data.
done: Done! You may now close this page.
persistence: To handle large projects, this tool must have permission for persistent local storage. On some browsers, this permission is given through the notifications permission, so please accept that request if it is asked. For very large projects, permission will also be requested to store data on Google Drive.
persistenceno: Failed to acquire permission for persistent storage. Large projects may fail.
mixlevelnew: Mix and level into new track
mustdrive: You are out of local storage space. To continue processing, you must use Google Drive for additional storage.
